price: A rainha disse: "Ó dignitários! Por certo, uma nobre missiva foi-me lançada.
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ إِنِّيٓ أُلۡقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَٰبٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u innī ul'qiya ilayya kitābun karīmun
